amendment.description: Amendment requires guaranty agencies to prove that attempts were made by the loan servicer to contact the borrower's school when collecting on a delinquent student loan.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 39 in the Congressional Record of April 28, 1998 to require guaranty agencies to prove that attempts were made by the loan servicer to contact the borrower's school when collecting on a delinquent student loan.
